name: .CML File Extension
summary: Learn about .CML files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: XML file saved in the Chemical Markup Language (CML) format, a standard used to specify chemical information; contains descriptions of molecule structures or other chemical informatics data; used for exchanging and archiving chemical data.

content: The CML language adheres to a strict DTD specification that is contained in a .XSD XML schema file. Multiple versions of the schema have been developed since the first release of the CML format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
